meanings.definition: To make someone or something become heathenized.
meanings.sent1: The missionaries heathenized the tribe by introducing new beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The ancient rituals heathenized the once peaceful village.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous children heathenized the classroom by playing pranks.
meanings.sent4: The storm heathenized the serene landscape, leaving destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The dark magic heathenized the enchanted forest, turning it into a place of fear.

meanings.definition: To convert someone or something to heathenism.
meanings.sent1: The charismatic leader heathenized many followers with his persuasive speeches.
meanings.sent2: The ancient texts heathenized the curious scholar, leading them down a new path.
meanings.sent3: The tempting offer heathenized the young prince, causing him to abandon his duties.
meanings.sent4: The forbidden knowledge heathenized the seeker, forever changing their perspective.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious artifact heathenized the archaeologist, drawing them into a world of mystery.
